description:
Soul Hunter (Vanillariis, osha21, miracchr, Andyyyyy3412, StureJaque, SoupFanAccount) is a game developed by Vanillariis, osha21, miracchr and Andyyyyy3412. It was originally released in 2022.
Soul Hunter (Vanillariis, osha21, miracchr, Andyyyyy3412, StureJaque, SoupFanAccount) is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
